items.sentence: Tom isn\'t very likely to find what he\'s looking for.
Unfavorable circumstances prevented me from traveling.
How can someone know if they\'re a good singer or not?
I think Tom and Mary are the ones who stole my wallet.
I think it would be better if Tom stayed here with us.
Tom has already been told to be here tomorrow at 2:30.
Tom heard some noise, but he wasn\'t sure what it was.
I know you don\'t want to hear what I\'m about to say.
I have a daughter that goes to the same school as Tom.
I have no idea why Tom wanted Mary to stop doing that.
There\'s not much difference between the two opinions.
I heard that Tom came back to Australia for Christmas.
What\'s your favorite recording of Beethoven\'s Fifth?
Tom didn\'t tell us that he\'d be in Boston this week.
You should chain the dog up, so he won\'t bite anyone.
Mary was wearing a blue dress the last time I saw her.
Could you tell Tom why you don\'t want him to do that?
Tom is very likely to be very tired when he gets here.
Tom wasn\'t amused by what was going on, but Mary was.
I thought that you said you wanted to do that for Tom.
